reviews.review: One of the Best  in Superhero genre. Every character has its importance. Don't know how did they even manage so well. Jaw dropping , confusing ending Like our Christopher Nolan. The  Best MCU villain so far. Intelligently crafted script. Only downside is too many Supers. Anyway Avengers is that too many on one screen.

The most ambitious, impressive cinematic event of our time. All roads of Marvel's Cinematic Universe over the past decade have led to this, and the payoff is immense. Josh Brolin's Thanos is easily one of the most robust, sublime antagonists in film history, and his role in this film as the long-awaited true opponent for the iconic Avengers is executed perfectly. What's more is that it's beautifully shot with brilliant filmmaking that executes the thrilling action and intensely emotional drama without a hitch, excellently weaving together these countless different characters and storylines from over the years, concluding with one of the most daringly bold finales I've ever seen. "Avengers: Infinity War" is nothing short of one of the most downright legendary films of all time.
This movie is something incredible, it takes a plotline which should be confusing and boring and turns it into a movie which shows deep emotion and amazing action and acting.
What an amazing movie. I was waiting for the movie for years now. Marvel really did not disappoint fans. Congratulations. Lokking forward to Avengers 4.
Brolin is fantastic as Thanos. A villain who is actually relatable a rarity for the MCU and the rest of the cast gives great performances worthy of award consideration
Great movie. I have probably seen all of the marvel movies and this one is the best. A great movie needs great actors, directors, and a good plot. Great job Anthony and Joe Russo

Greatest movie out rn! Fav one of all time... mostly any film in the MCU is my fav of all time because it’s the greatest collection of storytelling ever.. but infinity war is the best movie of all time rn! Can’t wait for the next 20 years of MCU films.(5/5)
Had me entertained the whole way though

The absolute beauty of this film is undeniable.  Never in the history of cinema has a single cinematic universe been brought together the that this movie does, and it is due to the magnificent ability of the Russo brothers that were able to balance the film in the way that they did that made it all possible.  This film is filled to the brim with familiar characters, but the Russos balanced them all beautifully, while giving them all purpose, meaning, and hearts.  Some of the aspects of the film were unclear - but that's what happens when you attempt this kind of feat.  It's the nature of the beast, and all things considered, I think the Russos did a magnificent job and making history with this film and setting the table for the most climactic events of the MCU to date.
Bad!!! Waste of money. Seen the last of this series.
